divs: Sighting Detailsaround dusk...the electrician and my older brother then around 11 or 12 ran in the house, my brother told my mom who was then washing dishes..MOM!! MOM!! theres a flying saucer out side..theres a flying saucer out side!!! My mom said "your crazy".. The electrician said "Lady, if thats not a flying saucer, then its a round plane".. I then along with 2 of my sisters ran to the storm window in the living room, nelt down and looked up to see a silver disk in the sky...with multi colored lights going round the disk but in no curtain direction..with no noise from the craft... i remember thinking to myself as a child, how is this spining in the sky but not going zig zag as a top would do if you spin it?? the craft just moved in a straight line.. I followed it with my eyes as long as i could until it passed in the direction over my house...i never forgot what happened there and remember as a child when i used to go out side the house and play basketball, i would look over in the woods and thing what if they landed there??? and i would get my ball and run back in the house... writting this right now makes me really realize that i as a child had nothing to gain by going through this or remembering this but you know what?? i still dont want anything, its just the TRUTH. I would like to know if there was anyone in Johnston, R.I. that saw the same . thank you Gary p.s. I hope this isnt some goverment mis information sight... just to make everyone think where fruitcakes but 75% of what we see on TV is fruitcake stuff... : )
Summary: johnston, R.I. (I along with others say flying silver disk)
